channel.title: Webclient (need help on win7)
channel.description:
i already made a webclient works great for me, but the only struglle is that my friend who wanted to test it out on a locally hosted server (i've send him the source + webclient.html) but he just got this error: [code]load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code]
is this just because he is playing with the locally webclient, so that if i put it online that it'll work? or do i have to change something. i'm a begining coder so i tryed, putting client.class to cache but that didn't work. Could someone help me on this?

item.title: Webclient (need help on win7)
item.dc:creator: @loock31 loock31
item.description:
@loock31 wrote:

no it can’t be, because if uploaded the cache on dropbox, and added an updater to my client.jar so it updates automatically, client uploaded to dropbox aswell, and the client run’s the client.jar good for me, but do windows 7 users other cache or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient (need help on win7)
item.dc:creator: @owner_nath owner nath
item.description:
@owner_nath wrote:

First Post - w0000t

its probably just his cache , the webclient hes using is probably differant cache to yours

Read full topic
